To accommodate our growing business in Thailand we have had to increase our staff. In fact, in just two years we have doubled our workforce to cope with exponential business growth, thanks also to the addition of new business divisions. As a people-first company, at FLS, the well-being, happiness and ongoing desire of all our personnel to deliver beyond expectations are crucial - to ensure that remains our focus we are delighted to move into our new office space at One Pacific Place, 12th Floor, Sukhumvit Road, Khlong Toei, Khlong Toei, Bangkok. We were honoured to have some special guests and staff join us for the opening. <\/p>","saveContent":"

wpPost.title: Our new office in Bangkok, Thailand

seo.title: Our new office in Bangkok, Thailand - FLS
seo.opengraphTitle: Our new office in Bangkok, Thailand - FLS
seo.opengraphDescription: To accommodate our growing business in Thailand we have had to increase our staff. In fact, in just two years we have doubled our workforce to cope with exponential business growth, thanks also to the addition of new business divisions. As a people-first company, at FLS, the well-being, happiness and ongoing desire of all our… Continue reading FLS News FLS Thailand New Office 4

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: To accommodate our growing business in Thailand we have had to increase our staff. In fact, in just two years we have doubled our workforce to cope with exponential business growth, thanks also to the addition of new business divisions. As a people-first company, at FLS, the well-being, happiness and ongoing desire of all our personnel to deliver beyond expectations are crucial - to ensure that remains our focus we are delighted to move into our new office space at One Pacific Place, 12th Floor, Sukhumvit Road, Khlong Toei, Khlong Toei, Bangkok. We were honoured to have some special guests and staff join us for the opening.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: If you’re in the neighbourhood, feel free to drop in and say ‘Hello’.

blocks.name: core/gallery
